metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6856 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The WebGL `DrawElementsInstanced` method was susceptible to a heap bufferoverflow when used on systems with the Mesa VM driver.  This issue couldallow an attacker to perform remote code execution and sandbox escape. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox< 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
